EmailTemplate.name: RE: New Contract (1325889509.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: New Contract (1325889509.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Bruce,
Sounds good. As a reminder the notary just needs to sign in section 2, a full ‘notarization’ is not necessary. If they notarize it that is fine, but its not required.
Steve
From: Bruce Hankins [mailto:bruce.hankins@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, January 06, 2012 5:37 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: New Contract
Steve,
Sorry to take so long on this. I've been busy working, which is a good thing. I expect to get the I9 form notarized tomorrow (Saturday).
Bruce Hankins http://about.me/bruce.hankins
Sent from my iMac
On Jan 3, 2012, at 7:36 PM, Steve Arhancet wrote:
Bruce,
Thank you. I just spoke with Steve; sending over the paperwork now to him and will cc you.
Steve
From: Bruce Hankins [mailto:bruce.hankins@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, December 30, 2011 4:02 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: New Contract
Steve,
I called you and left a message earlier this afternoon. My associate id is 1327. I'd like to become active with MBO Partners through a new contract with Watsontown Trucking Company in Milton, PA. The contact is the owner of the company, Steve Patton. He can be reached preferably on his mobile phone at 570-594-4791 or at his desk at 570-522-1240. He is expecting a call from MBO Partners. The arrangement is for me to be paid bi-weekly. The billing rate is $55.00 an hour. I'll be working around 40-45 hours a week. The project length could be 3-6 months initially and possibly go on indefinitely. My start date is Tuesday January 3, 2012. I'd also like to get started in the group health benefits.
Bruce Hankins http://about.me/bruce.hankins
Sent from my iMac
